EmailTemplate.name: Global_Webinar_JK_DS-Neil Raden-Data Warehouse_Q117.SWMY 2-28-17
EmailTemplate.subject: Sorry you missed The Data Warehouse in the Age of Digital Transformation webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/the-data-warehouse-in-the-age-of-digital-transformation??utm_source-pivotal&utm-medium-email-link&utm-campaign=datawarehouse-hiredbrains-q117]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We’re sorry you were unable to attend our webinar The Data Warehouse in the Age of Digital Transformation. You can, however, watch the replay of the webinar on-demand at your leisure and download the slide deck at the links below:
- Watch the webinar recording <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/the-data-warehouse-in-the-age-of-digital-transformation?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=ds-neilraden-dw-q117]]> - Download the webinar presentation <[[https://www.slideshare.net/Pivotal/pivotal-data-warehouse-in-the-age-of-digital-transformation?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=ds-neilraden-dw-q117]]>
Additional data warehouse resources:
- Read the White Paper: The Data Warehouse in the Age of Digital Transformation <[[https://content.pivotal.io/white-papers/the-data-warehouse-in-the-age-of-digital-transformation-white-paper?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=ds-neilraden-dw-q117]]> - Download the eBook: Shaping the Future of Data Warehousing through Open Source Software <[[https://content.pivotal.io/ebooks/shaping-the-future-of-data-warehousing-through-open-source-software?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=ds-neilraden-dw-q117]]> - Watch the Podcast: What is Happening to the Data Warehouse Market? <[[https://content.pivotal.io/podcasts/what-is-happening-to-the-data-warehouse-market?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=ds-neilraden-dw-q117]]>
And don’t miss future data warehouse and analytics webinars and other events from Pivotal. Check Pivotal’s upcoming webinars here <[[https://pivotal.io/resources/1/webinars?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=ds-neilraden-dw-q117]]>.
If you would like more information or have any questions about data warehousing and analytics, submit your question and contact information at pivotal.io/contact <[[http://pivotal.io/contact?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=ds-neilraden-dw-q117]]>.
Sincerely, The Pivotal Team
